comments:

failures were in Tree code.  One was a NPE, which I believe has already been 
fixed.  The other is as follows:

*** Bug 114027 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I have released a fix for this but I am still looking into to it further because
I don't like it.

Now a new set of errors have appeared in N20051028-0010.  These include an NPE 
and several "Widget is disposed" exceptions.

Fixed NPE and widget is disposed errors.   Confirmed by running the UiTestsSuite.

Fixed in HEAD > N20051028
